original_title: Heavy mist at Welipenna, be cautious when driving: Police
original_body_lines: Colombo, Jan 24 (Daily Mirror) - Motorists are urged to exercise caution while accessing the Welipenna interchange on the Southern Expressway, especially during the morning when visibility is reduced due to heavy mist, the police said.
They said the high misty condition prevailed this morning as well as during the previous days.
Therefore, motorists are requested not to drive at high speeds within this area.
